name: Your Bloody Companion
description:
You Own A Company.With LOTS And LOTS Of Money.But...You Have Got A New Companion!But...He's WAYYY Too Creepy.....He Actually Hides A SECRET......And You Should Be Careful.Its Veryy Rare For You To See Him In Secret Having Blood And A Gun.Save Your Company From Him!Quick!

(Contains:Blood,Jumpscares,Random Noises.)
